body_html:
Have I written custom code: No
OS Platform and Distribution: Mac OS 10.13.2
TensorFlow installed from: Github
TensorFlow version: r1.8
Bazel version: 0.13.1-homebrew
CUDA/cuDNN version: N/A
GPU model and memory: N/A
Exact command to reproduce: are following

$ cd tensorflow # cd to the top-level directory created
$ ./configure

Do you wish to build TensorFlow with Google Cloud Platform support? [y/N]Y
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with Hadoop File System support? [y/N]
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with the XLA just-in-time compiler? [y/N]Y
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with VERBS support? [y/N]Y
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with OpenCL support? [y/N]
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with CUDA support? [y/N] N

$ bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

body:
Have I written custom code: No
OS Platform and Distribution: Mac OS 10.13.2 
TensorFlow installed from: Github
TensorFlow version: r1.8
Bazel version: 0.13.1-homebrew
CUDA/cuDNN version: N/A
GPU model and memory: N/A
Exact command to reproduce: are following

`$ cd tensorflow  # cd to the top-level directory created`
`$ ./configure`

Do you wish to build TensorFlow with Google Cloud Platform support? [y/N]Y
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with Hadoop File System support? [y/N]
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with the XLA just-in-time compiler? [y/N]Y
**Do you wish to build TensorFlow with VERBS support? [y/N]Y**
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with OpenCL support? [y/N]
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with CUDA support? [y/N] N

`$ bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`
